TEXT.TITLE: MORRISON INC <MORR> 3RD QTR FEB 28 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 35 cts vs 29 cts Qtly div 12 cts vs 12 cts prior qtr Net 5,036,000 vs 4,165,000 Revs 147.6 mln vs 132.4 mln Nine mths Shr 1.12 dlrs vs one dlr Net 16.1 mln vs 14.4 mln Revs 433.4 mln vs 385 mln NOTE: Per share data reflect March 1986 five pct stock distribution. Cash dividend is payable April 30 to holders of record April 15. Reuter
